![Available for Forge](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@intergrav/devins-badges@3/assets/cozy/supported/forge_vector.svg)
![Available for NeoForge](https://interurban.dev/resources/neoforge_vector.svg)
![Available for Quilt](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@intergrav/devins-badges@3/assets/cozy/supported/quilt_vector.svg)

Railroad Blocks adds various railroad-themed blocks to Minecraft.

Total Downloads per platform:
![](https://img.shields.io/badge/dynamic/json?labelColor=black&color=grey&label=&suffix=%20downloads&query=downloads&url=https://api.modrinth.com/v2/project/sTmgisaB&style=flat&logo=data:image/png;base64,)
![](https://cf.way2muchnoise.eu/684961.svg)

## :green_square: Blocks
* Railroad Crossing Lights (Decorative)
* Iron Crossbuck
* Iron Pole
* Old Whistle Sign
* Railroad Crossing Advance Warning Sign
* Whistle Sign
* Wooden Crossbuck
* Wooden Pole

## :hammer: Items
* Green Flag
* Yellow Flag
* Red Flag
* Blue Flag

## :globe_with_meridians: Supported Languages
* :us: American English
* :gb: British English
* :cn: Simplified Chinese (81%)
* :tr: Turkish

## Version Information
This is version 0.6.4 of Railroad Blocks.

### Credits
All models and textures were made in [BlockBench](https://www.blockbench.net/) by [InterurbanDev](https://github.com/InterurbanDev).

Simplified Chinese translation by [lonelyicer](https://github.com/lonelyicer).
Turkish translation by [hhhhh-ckr](https://github.com/hhhhh-ckr).
